about_the_game:
Block'Em! is an action-filled block-building party game for 2 to 4 players!
The controls are simple but the road to victory is complex.
Be the first to reach the goal or be the last Blocky standing!
Block'Em! mixes platforming and puzzles in the most exciting way.

Race to the finish or be the last block standing!

Build bridges, or burn them!

Push friendships to the brink!

Play together with your friends (or enemies) up to 4 players online and locally!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8

  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
